snippet: McIlroy and Horschel will play together Sunday, and the winner will be guaranteed the $10 million FedEx Cup bonus, along with the $1.4 million winner’s check.
abstract: Rory McIlroy and Billy Horschel will play together in final round of the Tour Championship; winner will be guaranteed the $10 million FedEx Cup bonus awarded to the playoff champion, along with $1.4 million winner’s check; other golf news noted.

byline.original: By KAREN CROUSE and MIKE TIERNEY

lead_paragraph: McIlroy and Horschel will play together Sunday, and the winner will be guaranteed the $10 million FedEx Cup bonus, along with the $1.4 million winner’s check.

headline.main: Billy Horschel Faces Off With Rory McIlroy at the Tour Championship
headline.print_headline: A Challenger Faces Off With McIlroy
